data.fullContent: After three years of exploration, researchers have discovered a previously unknown, deep canyon in China's southwestern Sichuan Province. The canyon is located in a remote region of the Tibetan Plateau called the Qilian Mountains. The researchers estimate the canyon stretches about 117 miles (188 kilometers) long and 3,600 feet (1,100 meters) deep - similar to the Grand Canyon in the U.S. state of Arizona. Researchers think the canyon is a relatively new formation, one that was formed relatively recently in geologic time. In fact, its formation might have even been triggered by human activity. Researchers led by Dr. Lin from are now calling this region of the Sichuan Province the "Qilian Grand Canyon." Lin said he spotted what appeared to be a new canyon while looking at satellite photos of the area.

q1.translation: 经过三年的探索，研究人员在中国西南部四川省发现了一个以前不为人知的深峡谷。峡谷位于青藏高原的一个偏远地区，叫做祁连山。研究人员估计，该峡谷绵延约117英里(188公里)长，3600英尺(1100米)深，类似于美国亚利桑那州的大峡谷。研究人员认为，该峡谷是一个相对较新的地层，形成于相对较近的地质时期。
q1.front: After three years of exploration, researchers have discovered a previously unknown, deep canyon in China's southwestern Sichuan Province. The canyon is located in a remote region of the Tibetan Plateau called the Qilian Mountains. The researchers estimate the canyon stretches about 117 miles (188 kilometers) long and 3,600 feet (1,100 meters) deep - similar to the Grand Canyon in the U.S. state of Arizona. Researchers think the canyon is a relatively new formation, one that was formed relatively recently in geologic time.

Researchers think the ____ is a relatively new formation, one that was formed relatively ____ in geologic time.

q2.translation: 经过三年的探索，研究人员在中国西南部四川省发现了一个以前不为人知的深峡谷。峡谷位于青藏高原的一个偏远地区，叫做祁连山。研究人员估计，该峡谷绵延约117英里(188公里)长，3600英尺(1100米)深，类似于美国亚利桑那州的大峡谷。研究人员认为，该峡谷是一个相对较新的地层，形成于相对较近的地质时期。事实上，它的形成甚至可能是由人类活动引发的。由林博士领导的研究人员现在把四川省的这个地区称为“祁连大峡谷”。林说，他在查看该地区的卫星照片时发现了一个新的峡谷。

q2.middle: In fact, its formation might have even been triggered by human activity.
q2.ending: Researchers led by Dr. Lin from are now calling this region of the Sichuan Province the "Qilian Grand Canyon." Lin said he spotted what appeared to be a new canyon while looking at satellite photos of the area.

options.sentence: The plateau may have formed between 15 million and 10 million years ago when a new range of mountains grew out of a broad area of low ground.
A recent study suggests that the plateau may be more than 100,000 years old, making it younger than the nearby Tianshan Mountains, which are around 230,000 years old.
The discovery was reported by a Chinese team of scientists who are now studying its geological structure and history in order to understand how it formed.
The researchers describe the canyon as similar to the Grand Canyon in Arizona, U.S., but they say it is a relatively recent formation.
